Posts.Content: Hi thanks for info, it's really helped. My partner is going to come, he wanted to at start but I didnt have a idea about the appointment. he doesn't want me to google things incase I'm given wrong information. thank you for the link. Enjoy the rest of weekend :)
Posts.Title: Worrying and anxious.

Posts.Content: Hi, I got my appointment letter through on Friday. It's for this Thursday. Do you know how long it takes for results to come after tests? I'm relived things are moving forward now. On Friday I realized how scared I am. Even though things might be ok , it hit me how serous c is. April
Posts.Title: Worrying and anxious.

Posts.Content: This waiting about for my appointment is got me full of anxiousness. Constantly wondering when it will come in the post. I had one letter confirming that the doctor has sent information to the clinic. I'm constantly checking my breast for anymore changes. An it's only been 6 days since I went to the doctors. I feel really bad as I see loads of people struggling with what they are going through and I'v not even been to the clinic yet. I keep telling myself that I will be ok and really hope I am. I think everyone on here are so brave!
Posts.Title: Worrying and anxious.

Posts.Content: Hi Maggie, I'v not had one, my first appointment at hospital is this Thursday. They will do most of the tests there. So I'm not sure what to expect, would I get any results on the same day? Or would I have to wait? As I was thinking of going on my own, or should I take my partner? Thanks for getting back
Posts.Title: Worrying and anxious.

Posts.Content: Hi, thanks for getting back. it's good to hear it's normal to feel like this. My head is full of what ifs at min. Your right, nothing is going to change over next week or so. So iv went to worst case sanario in my head. I keep reminding myself of hope instead of I wish.. Something my dad always told me to do. His words of wisdom thats stuck with me. Sorry for rambling . thank you, I feel a bit more relaxed now Â :)
